void TerrainBlock1::cacheCurrentLighting ( bool  addSpecular = true  )  [virtual]

Stores the current lighting for later use.

Parameters:
addSpecular true to cache the specular lighting along with the diffuse, false to store only the diffuse.

Implements Terrain::BaseRenderTerrainBlock.

void TerrainBlock1::draw ( TerrainTextureSetter *  tts = NULL  )  [virtual]

Renders the terrain using the material defined by 'effect' if it's not null, or just render the terrain geometry without any effect.

Parameters:
tts texture setter to be used to render the terrain block, or NULL to just render the plain terrain geometry.

bool TerrainBlock1::draw ( Moo::EffectMaterialPtr  effect  )  [virtual]

Renders the terrain using the material defined by 'effect' if it's not NULL or, if it's NULL, just renders the terrain geometry without any effect.

Parameters:
effect effect to be used to render the terrain block, or NULL to just render the plain terrain geometry.
Returns:
true if successful

Implements Terrain::BaseRenderTerrainBlock.

uint32 TerrainBlock1::packedBlends ( uint32  x,
uint32  y 
) [protected]

Returns the four blends of an old terrain block in a single 32bit value.

Parameters:
x x coord in texture layer map coordinates
y y coord in texture layer map coordinates
Returns:
four packed blends in a single 32bit value, as required by the legacy terrain shader.

bool TerrainBlock1::postLoad ( std::string const &  filename,
Matrix const &  worldTransform,
Vector3 const &  cameraPosition,
DataSectionPtr  pTerrain,
TextureLayers &  textureLayers,
std::string *  error 
) [protected, virtual]

This virtual function is called after loading is done.

The TerrainBlock1 uses this as an opportunity to save the texture layers, etc.

Parameters:
filename A file to load the terrain block from.
error If not null and there was an error loading the terrain then this will be set to a description of the problem.
Returns:
True if the load was completely successful, false if a problem occurred.

Reimplemented from Terrain::CommonTerrainBlock1.

void TerrainBlock1::rebuildCombinedLayers ( bool  compressTextures = true,
bool  generateDominantTextureMap = true 
) [virtual]

Recreates the managed objects so the texture layers are updated, and if generateDominantTextureMap is true, generates the dominant texture map.

Parameters:
compressTextures ignored
generateDominantTextureMap true to generate the dominant texture map.

const Vector3 &  cameraPosition

Returns:
